ISSUE.TITLE: Creator user data displayed in the form after an error in the user creation form
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Creator user data displayed in the form after an error in the user creation form ### Dolibarr Version 19.0.2 ### Environment PHP _No response_ ### Environment Database _No response_ ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior 1. Set the address data of your user 2. Open the user creation form 3. Don't set anything and valid the form 4. Now data of the current user is set on the addresses fields ### Attached files ![Capture d’écran du 2024-08-01 14-09-51](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3263aaca-9fd2-4555-b0d5-2964aa432228) ![Capture d’écran du 2024-08-01 14-09-44](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/fe014491-7c7f-45e5-af42-a4adbaa5d78f)
